name: OLX - Quite Dark
description:
The new dark style for OLX #multilang (ad remove included)

Feel free to contribute the project on Github: https://github.com/pawelos076232/OLX-QuiteDark
additional_info: OLX has done a rebrand of the company so this style need to be rewrited In development: * Bulgaria OLX.bg * Poland OLX.pl * Portugal OLX.pt * Romania OLX.ro * Ukraine OLX.ua
css:
@-moz-document regexp("https?://(|www.)olx.(bg|pl|pt|ro|ua|)/((?!bezpieczenstwo|advertising|topfeature|payment|plata-prin-olx|livrare-cu-verificare|courier|safetyuser|mobile|mobilne).*)"){/*!
    || Name: OLX - Quite Dark                                 ||

    || Version: 1.0.1                                         ||
    || Userstyles: https://userstyles.org/styles/138633       ||
    || Github: https://github.com/pawelos076232/OLX-QuiteDark ||
    */body{color:#00909f;background:#202020}.bgfff,.maincategories,.gallerywide>li{background:#191919}a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#00909f}.c000,.locationrequest .distancelist.bold dt a{color:#fff}.c41{color:#ccc}.olx-rebranded-welcome__wrapper,.olx-rebranded-welcome__wrapper h3{color:initial}form.searchmain .button,form.search .button.search,form.searchmain input[type="text"]{background:#191919}form.searchmain .button,form.searchmain [data-icon="search"],form.searchmain [data-icon="location"],form.searchmain .clearbox [data-icon="close"],form.searchmain .locationrequest [data-icon="close"],form.searchmain input.queryfield,.suggestsearchmain li a.title{color:#00909f}form.searchmain .input-container{background:#191919;border-right-color:#202020}form.searchmain .button:hover,form.searchmain .button.is-focused{background-color:#00909f;border-color:#00909f;color:#191919}.suggestsearchmain li a.title:hover,.suggestsearchmain li a.search-choose-selected{background:#00909f}.suggestsearchmain li a.title{border-bottom-color:#2e383a}.suggestsearchmain{border-color:#202020 !important;box-shadow:0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.34)}.link,#footer-container .sitepopularbox__item h3,#footer-container .sitepopularbox__item .link.gray2,#footer-container .sitepopularbox__item .link.gray2>span,.link.gray:hover>*,a.tdnone:hover .link.gray>*,#footer-container .static.box ul li .link.gray,#footer-container .static.box ul li .link.gray>*,table.offers.redesigned .space h3 a:hover,table.offers.redesigned.userobserved-list .space h3 a:hover,listHandler table.offers.redesigned .space h3 a:hover{color:#00909f}.link:hover>*,a.tdnone:hover .link>*{color:#191919;background-color:#00909f}.maincategories .subcategories-list{background:#191919;border-color:#282828}.maincategories .maincategories-list .li .item a.selected:before{filter:invert(0.9)}.maincategories .subcategories-title{border-bottom-color:#303030}.gallerywide [data-icon^="star"]:hover,.gallerywide [data-icon^="star"].selected{color:#00909f}.mainpage-gallery .more-link a{box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 2px #00909f}.mainpage-gallery .more-link a:hover{box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 5px #00909f}#footer-container .footer-bottom{border-top-color:#445455}.link.gray>*{color:#ccc}form.search .clearbox{background:#191919;box-shadow:-1px 0 0 0 inset #202020}form.search input[type="text"],.locationrequest .input-container,.locationrequest .distancelist dt a,table.offers.redesigned .offer-wrapper,table.offers.redesigned.userobserved-list .offer-wrapper,listHandler table.offers.redesigned .offer-wrapper,.favgallerybox>li .card{background:#191919}form.search .clearbox [data-icon="close"],.locationrequest [data-icon="location"],.locationrequest .cityfield.bold,form.search .button.search,a.link.hn:hover>*,a.tdnone:hover .link.hn>*,.offersview div.section h2,.offersview div.section p,table.offers.redesigned tr .observelinkinfo [data-icon^=star],table.offers.redesigned.userobserved-list tr .observelinkinfo [data-icon^=star],listHandler table.offers.redesigned tr .observelinkinfo [data-icon^=star],#categoryLinksHeader .breaklist .link.gray,#categoryLinksHeader .breaklist .link.gray>*,.locationlinks ul li .link.gray{color:#00909f}form.search .button.search:hover,form.search .button.search.is-focused{background-color:#00909f;border-color:#00909f;color:#191919}form.search .option-search-criteria a{box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 2px #00909f}form.search .option-search-criteria a:hover{box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 5px #00909f}.view-lists .view__icon:not(.is-active){color:#00909f !important}.locationrequest.smallBox .distanceseparator{background:#202020}form.search .locationrequest{box-shadow:-1px 0 0 0 inset #202020}ul.tabs .tab.selected,ul.tabsfav .tab.selected{color:#00909f;box-shadow:inset 0 -2px 0 0 #002e33,0 1px 0 0 #008f9e}.pager .item span.current{border-color:#00909f}.brtop-1{border-top-color:#303030}.descgallery,.offer-sidebar__box,.offer__innerbox,.t-new_sidebar .quickcontact{background:#191919}.descgallery__navi{color:#00909f}.mandatory-login{background:#191919}.mandatory-login__why{box-shadow:inset 0 1px 0 0 #445455}.login-page ~ #footer-container{background:#202020}.login-box{background:#191919}.login-tabs__navigation li a{color:#00909f}.login-tabs__navigation li a:before{background:#00909f}}@-moz-document domain("olx.com.br"){body,*{color:#bdbdbd}body,.site_main,.module-gallery-premium .box-gallery-premium,.site_header .login-box
